participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

reshist_addr1_anynal.Description: Residential history derived - indicates if any type of Naloxone law was effective at date of baseline visit (address 1)

reshist_addr1_nal_protocol_standing.Description: Residential history derived - indicates if Naloxone law allowing distribution through a standing or protocol order was effective at date of baseline visit (address 1)

reshist_addr1_nal_Rx_prescriptive_auth.Description: Residential history derived - indicates if Naloxone law allowing pharmacists prescriptive authority was effective at date of baseline visit (address 1)

reshist_addr2_nal_Rx_prescriptive_auth.Description: Residential history derived - indicates if Naloxone law allowing pharmacists prescriptive authority was effective at date of baseline visit (address 2)
